mean_cn: n. 行为；  v. 做，指挥，传导（电、热等）
mean_en: the way that a person behaves in a particular place or situation
word_etyma: con共同 + duct引导，带来 → 引导大家一起做 → conduct 行为；指挥
sentence: Their intimate contact is indeed a hurtful conduct to that single man.
sentence_trans: 这对情侣亲密的动作简直就是深深伤害那只单身狗的行为。（单身狗也是狗，请停止虐狗行为ε(┬┬﹏┬┬)3）
